channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Replacing Exceptions-as-flow-control with the result pattern: Working with the result pattern - Part 1
item.description: In this post I discuss why you might want to use the result pattern, demonstrate it with a simple example and show a naïve, ugly, solution Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/working-with-the-result-pattern-part-1-replacing-exceptions-as-control-flow/

item.title: Major updates to NetEscapades.​AspNetCore.​SecurityHeaders
item.description: In this post I describe the recent major changes to NetEscapades.AspNetCore.SecurityHeaders, a NuGet package for adding security headers to your apps. Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/major-updates-to-netescapades-aspnetcore-security-headers/
